readable.title: 2490863987_715383944a
readable.content: A homeless man holds up a sign begging for money for beer , pot and a hooker . A man holds a sign outside a hotel that reads " Ok Ok Ok , I need money for beer , pot and a hooker . " A man in Seattle holds a sign begging for money . A scrubby looking man in a black sweatshirt holding a sign . The man is asking for money .
